metadata.title: CVE-2024-34055 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cyrus IMAP before 3.8.3 and 3.10.x before 3.10.0-rc1 allows authenticatedattackers to cause unbounded memory allocation by sending many LITERALs ina single command.

criterions.comment: cyrus-imapd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
